title: Are droids taking our jobs?
description: Robots and algorithms are getting good at jobs like building cars, writing articles, translating -- jobs that once required a human. So what will we humans do for work? Andrew McAfee walks through recent labor data to say: We ain't seen nothing yet. But then he steps back to look at big history, and comes up with a surprising view of what comes next.
author: Andrew McAfee
keywords: TED, talks, TEDx, business, technology, robots, AI, aircraft, work
